SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Potter.com?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Potter.com is arc {GillespieShop}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 136? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {474} from {GillespieShop} to {Potter.com}, a flow of {226} from {Potter.com} to {GillespieShop}, a flow of {155} from {GillespieShop} to {JohnsonLLC.com}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 55? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {51} from {GillespieShop} to {AtkinsonExpress}, a flow of {46} from {AtkinsonExpress} to {GillespieShop}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 73 and 104? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {91} from {Potter.com} to {AtkinsonExpress}, a flow of {81} from {AtkinsonExpress} to {Potter.com}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from AtkinsonExpress to Potter.com or from JohnsonLLC.com to AtkinsonExpress?
NC.A: The flow from {AtkinsonExpress} to {Potter.com} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from AtkinsonExpress to Potter.com, from GillespieShop to AtkinsonExpress, or from GillespieShop to Potter.com?
NC.A: The flow from {GillespieShop} to {Potter.com} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {GillespieShop}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {GillespieShop} and {Potter.com}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc GillespieShop, Arc Potter.com, Arc JohnsonLLC.com, Arc AtkinsonExpress}.
